# The `LegalityQuery` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery">LegalityQuery</a> object bundles together all the information that&#39;s needed to decide whether a given operation is legal or not. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery">LegalityQuery</a> object bundles together all the information that&#39;s needed to decide whether a given operation is legal or not.

For efficiency, it doesn&#39;t make a copy of Types so care must be taken not to free it before using the query.

Definition at line 109 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerinfo-h">LegalizerInfo.h</a>.
